mapper.sql: FORM_ID, RISK_TYPE_ID, RISK_TYPE_NAME, ORGAN_NO, ORGAN_NAME, TRANS_DATE, TRANS_TIME, CUST_NO, CUST_NAME, ACCT_NO, ACCT_NAME, PRIM_AO_NO, PRIM_AO_NAME, ADVS_CUST_NO, ADVS_CUST_NANME, ADVS_ACCT_NO, ADVS_ACCT_NAME, TELLER_NO, TELLER_NAME, TELLER_NO1, TELLER_NAME1, TX_CODE, TX_NAME, FLOW_ID, CD_FLAG, CURRENCY, TRANS_AMOUNT, EVENT_AMOUNT, LOST_AMOUNT, EVENT_CONTEXT, DEAL_DESCRIPTION, RISK_CONTEXT, WARN_ID, ADD_USER, ADD_TIME, ADD_REMARK, STATUS, IS_SHARE, BANK_CODE
mapper.select:
select
from AD_FAVORITE_TB T2
IS_SHARE = '1' or (IS_SHARE = '0'
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SM_USER_ORGAN_TB O WHERE O.ORGAN_NO = T2.ORGAN_NO AND O.USER_NO = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND EXISTS (select 1 from sm_organ_tb sot, sm_organ_parent_tb sopt where exists (select 1 from sm_users_tb sut where sut.user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sot.organ_no = sut.organ_no) and sot.organ_no = sopt.parent_organ and sopt.organ_no=T2.ORGAN_NO )
)
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_AD_FAVORITE_ID.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
insert into AD_FAVORITE_TB (FORM_ID, RISK_TYPE_ID, RISK_TYPE_NAME, ORGAN_NO, ORGAN_NAME, TRANS_DATE, TRANS_TIME, CUST_NO, CUST_NAME, ACCT_NO, ACCT_NAME, PRIM_AO_NO, PRIM_AO_NAME, ADVS_CUST_NO, ADVS_CUST_NANME, ADVS_ACCT_NO, ADVS_ACCT_NAME, TELLER_NO, TELLER_NAME, TELLER_NO1, TELLER_NAME1, TX_CODE, TX_NAME, FLOW_ID, CD_FLAG, CURRENCY, TRANS_AMOUNT, EVENT_AMOUNT, LOST_AMOUNT, EVENT_CONTEXT, DEAL_DESCRIPTION, RISK_CONTEXT, WARN_ID, ADD_USER, ADD_TIME, ADD_REMARK, STATUS, IS_SHARE, BANK_CODE ) values (#{formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{primAoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{primAoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advsCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advsCustNanme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advsAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{advsAcctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tellerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tellerNo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tellerName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eventAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lostAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{eventContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShare,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update AD_FAVORITE_TB
RISK_TYPE_ID = #{riskTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RISK_TYPE_NAME = #{riskTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGAN_NO = #{organNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGAN_NAME = #{organName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_DATE = #{transDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_TIME = #{transTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NO = #{custNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_NAME = #{custName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCT_NO = #{acctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCT_NAME = #{acctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIM_AO_NO = #{primAoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIM_AO_NAME = #{primAoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADVS_CUST_NO = #{advsCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADVS_CUST_NANME = #{advsCustNanme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADVS_ACCT_NO = #{advsAcctNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADVS_ACCT_NAME = #{advsAcctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELLER_NO = #{tellerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELLER_NAME = #{tellerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELLER_NO1 = #{tellerNo1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELLER_NAME1 = #{tellerName1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TX_CODE = #{txCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TX_NAME = #{txName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLOW_ID = #{flowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CD_FLAG = #{cdFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_AMOUNT = #{transAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EVENT_AMOUNT = #{eventAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOST_AMOUNT = #{lostAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EVENT_CONTEXT = #{eventContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL_DESCRIPTION = #{dealDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RISK_CONTEXT = #{riskContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WARN_ID = #{warnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_USER = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADD_REMARK = #{addRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_SHARE = #{isShare,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_CODE = #{bankCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where FORM_ID = #{formId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
